arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – The Paris lineup according to the press: Barcola or Mbaye?

arts.ttl: PSG XI vs Lille – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: PSG and Lille are set to face off at Stade Pierre-Mauroy in Ligue 1 this Sunday evening. Lille have only won one of their last 13 home league games against the Parisians, which came all the way back in 2019. PSG currently lead the Ligue 1 standings with 15 points and come into this fixture […] The post PSG XI vs Lille – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Paris lineup announced with Lee and Ramos
arts.sum: This Sunday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lille (6th) at the Stade Pierre Mauroy for matchday 7 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season (kick-off at 8:45 PM, CET). arts.ttl: Fabián Ruiz joins PSG’s growing injury list and will miss Sunday’s game at Lille
arts.sum: Coach Luis Enrique is without six first-team players. Fabián Ruiz has joined the growing Paris Saint-Germain injury list and will miss Sunday’s trip to play Lille in Ligue 1.

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Many injuries on the Parisian side, it’s official!

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – The referee for the 7th day’s match has been appointed, his statistics
arts.sum: This Sunday, as part of Matchday 7 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face eighth-place Lille at the Stade Pierre Mauroy (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). The referee for the match has been chosen: Benoît Bastien (42 years old). He has extensive experience in Ligue 1, having played 261 matches. The […]
